constructor_params.description:: Simplified calculation of interest rate: Let annual interest rate be 10 [%/Year] and Kovan's aver. block duration 4[s/Block] ===> (1/4)x[Block/s] = (1/4) [Block/(Year/(365 * 24 * 60 * 60))] = (1/4)*31536000 [Block/Year] = 7884000 [Block/Year], then:  10 [%Year] = 0.1 [1/Year] = ( (0.1 [1/Year]) / (7884000 [Block/Year]) ) = 1.2683916793505836e-08 [1/Block] = 1.2683916793505836e-08 x 10**18 [CONTRACT_INTEREST_RATE_UNIT/Block] = 12683916793.505836 [CONTRACT_INTEREST_RATE_UNIT / Block]. Please keep in mind that this is simplified CALCULATION, analytical formula is: Rate_per_block = (1 + Rate_per_year)**(1/Number_of_blocks_per_year) - 1
